priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Result Scale Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C177910

self.title: CDISC SDTM Result Scale Response Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the values that classifies the scale of the original result value with respect to whether the result is, for example, ordinal, nominal, quantitative, or narrative.
name: Result Scale Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Result Scale Response Terminology

terms.definition: A textual description of the particulars of an act, occurrence, or course of events.
A scale or classification with no inherent order to the values, which uses named categories or labels.
A scale that uses an ordered set of values where the difference between successive designations may not be constant.
A numeric measure of a physical attribute of an entity or substance.
